publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3807 Mr Andy Kerr: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/42) be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3807 Mr Andy Kerr: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/42) be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
